name: Beast Buster
description:
To Play:

Click on cards on the table to load up your projectile and use the same color card against matching monsters for more damage!

To reload on cards, just play all your cards or click on the little boxes on the table to reload.

If the table doesn't load properly (no cards on start) please just restart because this is held together with duct tape and a dream.

Deveolpment: 

Developed in 66 hrs for the EGaDS BLM game jam at UT in July 2020.

The genre says Puzzle, but frankly it's Survival because the program could crash at any time. Made with Visual Studio, GLFW, GLEW, FreeType, and lots of pain.

Monster sprites come from a pack by xBeowulf on itch.io
